column1: NGR is from 1950s record, the location is not quite in the catchment of Nant Calettwr and does not quite fit the description of the location on the 1920s sheet. The gauge moved in 1921, not indication of distance but the altitude change appears to be small 1500 to 1490
The gaps in the records are for bracketed readings that have been removed along with the respective annual totals

1921 total is bracketed but none of the monthly records are and the total matches the sum of the monthly readings. The total may be in brackets because the gauge moved in September of that year. Annual total left in the record
